text: Paralepetopsis floridensis is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Neolepetopsidae, one of the families of true limpets. Paralepetopsis floridensis is the type species in the genus Paralepetopsis. ==Description== ==Distribution== West of the coast of Florida between continental slope and continental rise, at the base of continental slope == Habitat == cool, hypersaline and sulphide seeps ==References== ==External links== * Category:Neolepetopsidae Category:Gastropods described in 1990
title: Paralepetopsis floridensis
